mapper.select: select id, file_location, category_id, file_ext, filename_source, filename_saved, filepath, urlpath, filesize, dateline_update, netdisk_url, netdisk_pwd from newxton_companywebsite.nxt_uploadfile where id = #{id}

select id, file_location, category_id, file_ext, filename_source, filename_saved, filepath, urlpath, filesize, dateline_update, netdisk_url, netdisk_pwd from newxton_companywebsite.nxt_uploadfile limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into newxton_companywebsite.nxt_uploadfile(file_location, category_id, file_ext, filename_source, filename_saved, filepath, urlpath, filesize, dateline_update, netdisk_url, netdisk_pwd) values (#{fileLocation}, #{categoryId}, #{fileExt}, #{filenameSource}, #{filenameSaved}, #{filepath}, #{urlpath}, #{filesize}, #{datelineUpdate}, #{netdiskUrl}, #{netdiskPwd})
mapper.update:
update newxton_companywebsite.nxt_uploadfile
file_location = #{fileLocation},
category_id = #{categoryId},
file_ext = #{fileExt},
filename_source = #{filenameSource},
filename_saved = #{filenameSaved},
filepath = #{filepath},
urlpath = #{urlpath},
filesize = #{filesize},
dateline_update = #{datelineUpdate},
netdisk_url = #{netdiskUrl},
netdisk_pwd = #{netdiskPwd},
where id = #{id}
